author: Anna Merlan, Tim Marchman
title: The Coronavirus Truthers Don't Believe in Public Health
description: Social-distancing protesters, “medical freedom” advocates, and anti-vaccine activists all rely on deeply flawed ideas about how public health measures work—and how safe they are themselves.
content: Dr. Shiva Ayyadurai puts a lot of stock in his immune system, and in yours. The highly litigious self-proclaimed inventor of email has been campaigning zealously for the Republican nomination in Massachusetts' Senate race under the slogans Be the Light and Tr… [+13410 chars]
